DataSourcePortable.Name: Aditivos de compra para aprovar
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(*) QTDE
 FROM CN_CONTRATOADITIVOS 
 WHERE CONTRATO IN (SELECT HANDLE
 FROM CN_CONTRATOS
 WHERE TIPOCONTRATO IN (SELECT HANDLE
 FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS
 WHERE TIPO = 1
 AND EHCONVENIO = 1
 )
 )
 AND
 (
 (
 STATUS = 2
 )
 AND
 (
 (
 ALCADA IN(SELECT C.HANDLE
 FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B,
 CP_GRUPOALCADAS C
 WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE
 AND
 (
 (
 C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S'
 AND B.SEQUENCIA >= SEQUENCIAALCADA
 )
 OR
 (
 C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S'
 AND B.SEQUENCIA = SEQUENCIAALCADA
 )
 )
 AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO
 AND B.ATIVO = 'S'
 )
 )
 OR
 (
 ALCADA IN (SELECT D.GRUPO
 FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D,
 CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I,
 CP_GRUPOALCADAS G
 WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE
 AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE
 AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE
 AND
 (
 (
 G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S'
 AND I.SEQUENCIA >= SEQUENCIAALCADA
 )
 OR
 (
 G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N'
 AND I.SEQUENCIA = SEQUENCIAALCADA
 )
 )
 AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO
 AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO
 AND D.ATIVO = 'S'
 AND I.ATIVO = 'S'
 AND I.AUSENTE = 'S'
 )
 )
 )
 ) 
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QTDE" From="A" Path="QTDE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
